title: Microwaves ovens U.S. unit shipments 2005 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Unit shipments in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
Overall Unit shipments in millions has decreased over the Year.

Unit shipments in millions is roughly constant from 2005 to 2006, gradually decreasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Unit shipments in millions, about 13.86 was reported at Year 2005
Minimum Unit shipments in millions about 9.15 was reached at Year 2013
